kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '• Submit application through the online portal • Initial screening • Interviews' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='application_process']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='app_detail']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg:
• Fresh graduates are also welcome.
• Bachelor's degree or above graduates in Finance, Economics or Accounting, or a related field.
• Having Analyst License (CFA, CISA) would be an advantage.
• Experience in utilizing Excel to build/maintain financial models; An advanced level of Excel proficiency is expected and required.
• The ability to work under the guidance of mentors and develop fundamental research-driven ideas.
• A highly competitive self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
• Submit application through the online portal\n• Initial screening\n• Interviews

Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.

kw.msg: Typing text 'Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='app_detail']'.

kw.arg:
• Fresh graduates are also welcome.
• Bachelor's degree or above graduates in Finance, Economics or Accounting, or a related field.
• Having Analyst License (CFA, CISA) would be an advantage.
• Experience in utilizing Excel to build/maintain financial models; An advanced level of Excel proficiency is expected and required.
• The ability to work under the guidance of mentors and develop fundamental research-driven ideas.
• A highly competitive self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
• Submit application through the online portal\n• Initial screening\n• Interviews

Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='app_detail']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg:
• Fresh graduates are also welcome.
• Bachelor's degree or above graduates in Finance, Economics or Accounting, or a related field.
• Having Analyst License (CFA, CISA) would be an advantage.
• Experience in utilizing Excel to build/maintain financial models; An advanced level of Excel proficiency is expected and required.
• The ability to work under the guidance of mentors and develop fundamental research-driven ideas.
• A highly competitive self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
• Submit application through the online portal\n• Initial screening\n• Interviews

Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.

kw.msg: Typing text '• Submit application through the online portal • Initial screening • Interviews' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='application_process']'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='app_detail']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg:
• Fresh graduates are also welcome.
• Bachelor's degree or above graduates in Finance, Economics or Accounting, or a related field.
• Having Analyst License (CFA, CISA) would be an advantage.
• Experience in utilizing Excel to build/maintain financial models; An advanced level of Excel proficiency is expected and required.
• The ability to work under the guidance of mentors and develop fundamental research-driven ideas.
• A highly competitive self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
• Submit application through the online portal\n• Initial screening\n• Interviews

Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.' into text field 'xpath=(//h4[contains(text(),'Research Assistant Application')]/ancestor::div[@class='mt-4 p-4 border rounded bg-light position-relative'])//textarea[@name='app_detail']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg:
• Fresh graduates are also welcome.
• Bachelor's degree or above graduates in Finance, Economics or Accounting, or a related field.
• Having Analyst License (CFA, CISA) would be an advantage.
• Experience in utilizing Excel to build/maintain financial models; An advanced level of Excel proficiency is expected and required.
• The ability to work under the guidance of mentors and develop fundamental research-driven ideas.
• A highly competitive self-starter who thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

Research will have to provide an analysis of company/stock data for Equity analysts and aid them in regard to the preparation of data to write up investment decision research papers and clients' requests. Other aspects of research work involve producing financial models, evaluating public information, and gathering any other available forms of data to support the analysts' work.
